options.name: settings
options.description: Get or update User settings, blank fields will be ignored

options.name: hide-container
options.description: If false, container commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.

options.name: hide-user
options.description: If false, user commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.

options.name: hide-item
options.description: If false, item commands will be visible to the server. Otherwise, only you can see them.
